goal: Add type annotation support to TypeScript snapshot generation for function/method parameters
description: Enhance TypeScript validator's _extract_parameters() method to extract type annotations from tree-sitter AST nodes and return parameter objects with both name and type information, matching the format used by Python snapshot generation.

contains.name: _extract_parameters
contains.description: Extract parameter information including type annotations from formal_parameters node

contains.name: _extract_type_from_node
contains.description: Extract type annotation text from a TypeScript type AST node
